analysis.description:
Crowdfunding.withdraw (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#463-467) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! fund.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#463-465)

Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#116-117) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#69)

Crowdfunding.fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#448-460) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bounty.transfer(msg.sender,bountyVal) (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#457-460)
Crowdfunding.reference (state variable @ /unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#321-323) shadows built-in symbol "reference"
CreatorCrowdfunding.abi (function @ /unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#475-495) shadows built-in symbol "abi"

Reentrancy in BuilderCrowdfunding.create (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#555-580):
	External calls:
	- inst.setOwner(_client) (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol)
	- inst.setHammer(_client) (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- ! beneficiary.send(buildingCostWei) (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#572-573)
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value - buildingCostWei) (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#573-575)
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#580)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getContractsOf (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xe0d1c0926fd72107b866c1ba5dd2245fcb51eee7.sol#69)
